fact: Bananas are berries, but strawberries are not.
Octopuses have three hearts.
Peanuts are not nuts; they are legumes.
Honey never spoils. Archaeologists have found pots of honey in ancient Egyptian tombs that are over 3000 years old and still perfectly edible.
A group of flamingos is called a flamboyance.
The shortest war in history lasted only 38 minutes between Britain and Zanzibar on August 27, 1896.
The unicorn is the national animal of Scotland.
The longest wedding veil was longer than 63 football fields.
The world's oldest piece of chewing gum is over 9,000 years old.
A crocodile cannot stick its tongue out.
A baby puffin is called a puffling.
A flock of crows is known as a murder.
An ostrich's eye is bigger than its brain.
Penguins can jump up to 6 feet in the air.
The shortest war in history was between Zanzibar and England on August 27, 1896. Zanzibar surrendered after just 38 minutes.
The Eiffel Tower can be 15 cm taller during the summer, due to thermal expansion of the iron.
The smell of freshly-cut grass is actually a plant distress call.
The world's oldest known recipe is for beer.
Koalas sleep around 18 hours a day.
Banging your head against a wall burns 150 calories an hour.
A hippo's milk is pink.
The tongue is the strongest muscle in the human body.
The Earth has traveled more than 5,000 miles in the past 5 minutes.
An average person spends 6 months of their lifetime waiting for a red light to turn green.
There are more possible iterations of a game of chess than there are atoms in the known universe.
The human brain takes in 11 million bits of information every second, but is aware of only 40.
A single cloud can weigh more than 1 million pounds.
Antarctica is the only continent without any reptiles or snakes.
Bees can recognize human faces.
A teaspoonful of neutron star material would weigh about 6 billion tons.
Some cats are allergic to humans.
Cows have best friends and can become stressed when they are separated.
The shortest war in history was fought between Britain and Zanzibar on August 27, 1896. Zanzibar surrendered after 38 minutes.
A group of pugs is called a grumble.
